thread.title: ‘We’re Going to Raise Our Hands Like Big Boys and Girls’: Sean Spicer Lectures Reporter on Etiquette
thread.title_full: ‘We’re Going to Raise Our Hands Like Big Boys and Girls’: Sean Spicer Lectures Reporter on Etiquette

author: Justin Baragona
title: ‘We’re Going to Raise Our Hands Like Big Boys and Girls’: Sean Spicer Lectures Reporter on Etiquette
text:
Video ‘We’re Going to Raise Our Hands Like Big Boys and Girls’: Sean Spicer Lectures Reporter on Etiquette by Justin Baragona | 4:22   
At today’s White House press briefing, White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer admonished a reporter for not waiting his turn and trying to ask a question while Spicer was calling on another person. 
In what felt like a real-life version of the now famous SNL skits starring Melissa McCarthy , Spicer lectured New York Times reporter Glenn Thrush for not following proper etiquette in the press room. 
Following Spicer answering a question about medical marijuana, Thrush tried to shout out his question while the press sec moved to another reporter. 
“Glenn, this isn’t a TV program,” Spicer said. “You don’t get to just yell out questions.” 
He continued, “We’re going to raise our hands like big boys and girls.” 
Watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[image via screengrab]
